message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to start with a competitive price. I'm offering it to you for $18000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I have to stay within my budget.

I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I have to consider my own needs. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm counteroffering at $16000.
I'm still interested in the product, but $16000 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $14000, but that's my final offer. I'm getting close to considering buying it from John at $10000
